https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rbKcMGVlPSpmw2neJPYHdZwLlpB.jpg A Tom Tom Chaser is Jacobs' 2002 poetic riff on the transformation of his classic film Tom Tom the Piper's Son from chemical to electronic form during the telecine process. A Tom Tom Chaser
